channel.description: Week 5 Announcements This Week Wed: Lab 4 Due 7 PM Wed: Week 4 Response 11:59 PM Wed: Week 5 Questions 11:59 PM Thur: Speaker: Hunter Guthrie 3:30 PM Next Week: Lab 5 Monday 7 PM Lab 4 Grading Windows Server Windows AD User/Group Windows -> AD OpenLDAP User/Group Ubuntu -> LDAP Ubuntu -> AD Success Read Carefully See Posted Diagrams Use Resources Ask Questions Don't "Spin Your Wheels" Speaker: Hunter Guthrie Plant System Administrator Evergy - Wolf Creek Former CIS 527 Student Highly Secure Industry Lab 5 Move to Cloud 2 Droplets on DO Set up SSH Set up Firewall Simple Apache Sites DNS Name GitHub Pack https://education.github.com/pack
